# Images Reference documentation for image handling and rendering in Vista Graphics. ## Image Topics - [Image Drawing](/wiki/graphics/images/image-drawing/) - Image command usage - [Image Scaling](/wiki/graphics/images/image-scaling/) - Size and scaling - [Sprite Sheets](/wiki/graphics/images/sprite-sheets/) - Sprite animation - [Pixel Art Mode](/wiki/graphics/images/pixel-art-mode/) - smooth off for pixel art ## Image Example `draw canvas [ image "sprite.png" 100 100 image "sprite.png" 200 100 32 32 ]` ## See Also - [Drawing](/wiki/graphics/drawing/) - Drawing reference - [Tutorials](/wiki/graphics/tutorials/) - Learning guides
